name: Cat-Verse
description:
Game made for FallJam

CONTROLS

Move with the arrow keys or WASD

Jump via "SPACE"

To change between characters, use: '1' or '2' buttons.

To use Tiny's trampoline ability, press R, to use his crush, press 'LMB'

To use Fluffy's attack, press 'LMB', to climb obstacles with Fluffy, press "Up Arrow Key"
